description: You've successfully submitted your application. It's now recorded in our system and waiting to be processed.
Your application is being actively reviewed by our team. We're working to ensure all the information is accurate and complete.
We're conducting a credit assessment to better understand your financial background. This step helps us tailor the best possible offer for you.
Congratulations! We've made an offer based on the information you provided. Now, we're waiting for you to accept the offer and move forward.
We need your confirmation on the provided documents. Please review the details carefully and let us know if everything is in order.
To finalize the process, we're ensuring all the necessary requirements are met. This may include additional documentation or specific actions from your end.
Congratulations! Your application journey is complete. All the steps have been successfully finished, and your application is now closed.
We regret to inform you that your application has been declined at this time. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our team.
Unfortunately, your application has expired as it was not completed within the specified timeframe. You can consider reapplying when you're ready.
Your application was automatically abandoned due to inactivity. If you're still interested, please start a new application.
Your application has become stale due to a lack of updates. Please reach out to us if you'd like to proceed or update your application.
You've chosen to discontinue your application before its completion. If you change your mind, you're welcome to restart the application process.
Your application has been canceled, either at your request or due to specific reasons. Feel free to contact us for more information.
